identity.name: Forma Strategy
visual_principles: Radical Clarity: White background, absolute contrast.
Data is Art: Numbers are the heroes, styled with monospaced precision.
Organic Signal: Green is not just a color, it's the pulse of the system.
Kinetic Urgency: Everything moves (tickers, counters) to signal a living economy.

headings.usage: Hero titles, Section headers, Big Metric Labels

mono.usage: Prices, Token Addresses, Calculator Inputs, Transaction Hashes

usage_rules.background: ALWAYS Pure White (#FFFFFF). No off-whites for main background.
usage_rules.text: Main text is #09090B (Zinc 950). Muted text is #71717A (Zinc 500).
usage_rules.borders: All structural borders must be #000000 (Black) or #E4E4E7 (Zinc 200) depending on hierarchy.
usage_rules.buttons: Primary actions: Black bg + White text OR Green bg + Black text. Hover: Invert or offset shadow.
usage_rules.gradients: FORBIDDEN. Use solid colors and patterns only.

buttons.primary: bg-black text-white hover:bg-green-500 hover:text-black transition-all duration-200 font-bold uppercase tracking-wide border-2 border-black shadow-[4px_4px_0px_0px_rgba(16,185,129,1)] hover:translate-x-[2px] hover:translate-y-[2px] hover:shadow-none
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-black border-2 border-black hover:bg-zinc-100 font-bold uppercase tracking-wide

inputs.style: bg-white border-2 border-black text-lg font-mono focus:ring-0 focus:border-green-500 focus:shadow-[4px_4px_0px_0px_rgba(16,185,129,1)] transition-all placeholder:text-zinc-300

calculator.wrapper: bg-white border-2 border-black p-8 relative overflow-hidden
calculator.result_display: font-mono text-4xl md:text-6xl font-bold text-green-600 tracking-tighter

marquee.style: bg-black text-white py-3 font-mono text-sm uppercase tracking-widest border-y-2 border-black
marquee.content: LIVE TRANSACTIONS • BUYBACK EXECUTED • YIELD UPDATED •

principles: Instant Feedback: Buttons snap, inputs focus immediately.
Constant Flow: Tickers and marquees never stop.
Data Live: Numbers count up, charts pulse.

animations.fade_in_up: initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 20 }} animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }} transition={{ duration: 0.5 }}

assets.icons: Use 'lucide-react' for UI icons. Use 'phosphor-icons' (Bold weight) for feature highlights.

instructions_to_main_agent.general: You are building a high-performance crypto mini-app. Speed and clarity are paramount. Do not use heavy blurs or glassmorphism. Use sharp lines and solid colors.
instructions_to_main_agent.layout_strategy: Use the 'Tetris Grid' for the landing page. Use the 'Control Room Grid' for the calculator/dashboard.
instructions_to_main_agent.calculator_logic: The calculator is the core feature. It must feel like a 'Simulation Engine'. When inputs change, animate the results. Show 'What If' scenarios.
instructions_to_main_agent.web3_integration: Mock the Web3 connection for now, but build the UI states (Connected, Disconnected, Wrong Network, Pending Transaction).
instructions_to_main_agent.charts: Use 'recharts'. Style them minimally: Black lines, Green areas, no grid lines, no axes labels unless necessary.
universal_guidelines: NO DARK MODE. Force light mode classes.
NO GRADIENTS on buttons or backgrounds.
Ensure mobile responsiveness (stack grids to 1 column).
